problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): I watched an old man talking to a much more youthful man the other day in the park. The old man was trying to help the more youthful one to remember some details about a party they were both at a few years ago, but sadly it wasn't going very well.
Question: Who has a good memory?
ans0: The old man
ans1: The more youthful man
ans2: Cannot answer
